item.title: Altitude Restaurant
item.desc:
Experience the culinary expertise of our chefs and indulge your taste buds with our innovative and sumptuous a la carte menu, complemented by outstanding New Zealand wines while taking in the spectacular views over the Hanmer basin and mountains. Enjoy exceptional dining or simply sip on a glass of wine on the outdoor balcony or by the open fire in winter.
Indoor/outdoor dining available for breakfast and dinner. Lunch by prior arrangement. Please phone for reservations.
Restaurant, Bar, Accommodation, Day Spa

item.title: Chantellinis Restaurant And Cafe
item.desc:
Experience a French-inspired, Award-winning, fine dining restaurant, set in a romantic and candlelit setting. Offering exceptional hospitality in a warm atmosphere, with magnificent mountain and garden views, complete in a traditional 1930s restored villa.
Chantellinis champions the finest local and seasonal produce, complete with an extensive wine list which complements the menu, while showcasing the best wines from Waipara and New Zealand. Craft beers or cocktails can be enjoyed while dining by the log fire in winter or, alfresco on the terrace in the rose garden during summer. With an extensive menu to suit all tastes, Chantellinis is the ultimate restaurant for those who want a special dining experience.
Open 7 days.
Bookings recommended.

item.title: Coriander's Ethnic Indian Restaurant
item.address1: Shop 5/30 Cnr Conical Rd Hill & Chisolm Ave.
item.desc:
We welcome you to a very delightful, pleasurable and memorable visit to Coriander's Ethnic Indian Restaurant in Hanmer Springs with a hospitality that comes from deep within our heart. The culinary art of selecting piquant condiments and aromatic herbs makes Coriander's a unique place to wine and dine.
The menu at Coriander's is extensive with both vegetarian and non vegetarian choices and ranges from entrees through to a wide selection of main dishes which will delight your palate with the owner Amar's invention such as Lamb posht, Bombay Chicken, Chicken do payaza and so on, which you will experience with the perfect ambience. A well crafted menu for your kids and a gluten free menu for the preferred guest. Owner Amardeep Singh, believes success comes only by passion, training, attention to detail and belief in people.
Four Locations: Edgeware : P +64 3 366 7223 Rolleston: P +64 3 347 2315 Hanmer Springs: P +64 3 315 7616 Kaikoura: P +64 3 319 6844

item.title: Jollie Jacks Cafe & Bar
item.desc:
Jollie Jacks is a family restaurant serving New Zealand's best fare on offer having been awarded New Zealand's lamb and beef awards on several occasions. Bar with local wines available. Jollie Jacks have a outdoor dining facility with lunch and dinner menus. Jollie Jacks prides itself on hospitality and making the dining experience one to remember.
Menus available on our website www.jolliejacks.co.nz

item.title: Malabar Restaurant & Bar
item.desc:
Award-winning restaurant, the first to embrace Asian fusion dining in Hanmer Springs. Rave reviews for its fusion of East with modern influences.
Experience the spirit of Asia with a sharing menu. A celebrated cocktail list and local and international wine selection completes the experience.
Open 7days.
Alpine Pacific Centre

item.title: Monteiths Brewery Bar
item.desc:
The best local fare and wines on the menu with substantial platters - perfect to share.
Featuring the exceptional range of Monteiths draft beers, we recreate the legendary hospitality of the West Coast, friendly, fun and great food - all at your "local on the corner." Gluten free options available. Children's DVD entertainment area.
Open 7 days.

item.title: No. 31 Restaurant & Bar
item.desc:
Chef/Owner Previously of "The Old Post Office Restaurant" Hanmer Springs Beef & Lamb Ambassador 1999 & 11 years Beef & Lamb Excellence Awards. Modern New Zealand Cuisine & Fine Local Wines Fully Licensed.
Open evenings 5:30-Late.
Contact: Helene/Michael van de Wiel

item.title: Powerhouse Cafe & Restaurant
item.desc:
Situated in a historic hydro-electric power-station, Powerhouse Cafe & Restaurant is dedicated to connecting visitors with the heritage of Hanmer Springs through hospitality from the heart.
Featuring superlative food, espresso as it should be and exemplary Waipara wines, Powerhouse offers an essential celebration of local flavours. Daily from 8am for breakfast, brunch & lunch.
Evening weekend dining. Reservations for dinner recommended, and appreciated.

item.title: Spa Braemar
item.desc:
Exhale slowly... and truly escape as we ease away tension and stress, revitalise your senses and soothe your soul...
A synergy of East & West, Spa Braemar is a destination of relaxation, rejuvenation and well-being.
We offer a full range of treatments from traditional and therapeutic massage and body treatments to premium beauty therapies.
Studio gym and relaxation room available.
Open daily 10am to 7pm
To make a booking or for further information phone:03 315 7555

item.title: Thai Chilli Restaurant & Takeaway
item.desc: Authentic Thai food dine in or takeaway. Customers can call to place an order to pick up. Open Tuesday to Sunday. Lunch hours: 11am - 2.30pm Evening hours: 4.30pm - 9.30pm

item.desc:
Located inside the Thermal Pools - Free entry through the main entrance.
Great Food from 10am daily. * Breakfast * Snacks * All day menu * Pizzas * Kids menus * desserts * Coffees and teas * Wines and beers
Famous for our Gourmet Burgers.
Evening reservations recommended.

item.title: The Spa At Hanmer Springs
item.desc:
No trip to Hanmer Springs is complete without a visit to our luxuriously relaxing Spa. Make a booking to enjoy the ultimate in health and beauty treats.
Options include: Relaxing massage, body wraps, facials, pedicures and manicures and - to finish, our famous Chocolate Facial.
Open daily 10am - 7pm.

item.title: Whatever! Cafe Restaurant Bar
item.desc: It's Hanmer's contemporary eatery situated in the heart of Hanmer Springs across the road from the Four Square, right next to the Heritage Hotel. Great Steaks, Sensational Seafood, Best Chowder in town, Tasty Pasta, Wonderful Pork - something for everyone - including the kids. Come and join Steve and Jill at WhatEver! Cafe, Restaurant & Bar in an enjoyable and relaxing environment.
